relation: Original / Romaji Lyrics
Lyrics from Animelyrics.comkimi no mama de kawaranaide dare yori mo taisetsu na ookina yume kagayakaseta tada hitori no tomodachi
Lyrics from Animelyrics.comnani o shite mo tsutawarazu umaku ikanai bakari de watashi datte dare datte atari mae ni aru koto
Lyrics from Animelyrics.comMUNE no naka ni kaeranai omoi mo kotoba mo itsuka jikan ga tateba modotte kuru kara shiranai uchi ni
Lyrics from Animelyrics.comima kimi ga dekiru koto wa hitotsu sono mama ukeirete yukou

Lyrics from Animelyrics.com* kimi no mama de itsu warazuni sukoshi hitoyasumi shite aseru kimochi kurushii koto kimi no PAWAA ni kaete kimi no mama de kawaranaide dare yori mo taisetsu na ookina yume kagayakaseta tada hitori no tomodachi
Lyrics from Animelyrics.comnando kimi no akarusa ni watashi sukuwareta darou yasashii koe to omoi o itsumo wasurezuni iru
Lyrics from Animelyrics.comashita ni nareba mou atarashii PAWAA ga wakidasu hazu sa

Lyrics from Animelyrics.comureshii koto kanashii koto subete ukeireta kara deaetan da kimi to watashi tomodachi ni naretan da kimi no mama de kawaranaide dare yori mo taisetsu na yurushi aeru kokoro nagomu tada hitori no tomodachi
Lyrics from Animelyrics.com* Repeat
English Translation
Lyrics from Animelyrics.comStay the way you are, you're more important than anyone else You're my one and only friend who makes my great dreams shine
Lyrics from Animelyrics.comWhatever I try to do to get along, it never goes well For me or anyone else, it's a natural thing.
Lyrics from Animelyrics.comMy words and thoughts will never return inside me In time things will be back to normal before I know it
Lyrics from Animelyrics.comThere is one thing you can do now And that's to accept things as they are

Lyrics from Animelyrics.comBefore you collapse, just rest a little as you are Rushing feelings, painful things, change them into your power Stay the way you are, you're more important than anyone else You're my one and only friend who makes my great dreams shine
Lyrics from Animelyrics.comHow many times have I been cheered up by you I wonder Before I forgot the kind thoughts and desires.
Lyrics from Animelyrics.comWhen the future arrives, the new power should start to grow.

Lyrics from Animelyrics.comHappy things, sad things, I've accepted them all so You and I can meet, we can become friends Stay the way you are, you're more important than anyone else You're my one and only friend who has a kind heart towards me
Lyrics from Animelyrics.com* Repeat
